string.text: The AMB-17 is an integrally suppressed assault rifle that uses a heavy subsonic 9Ã—39mm SP5 cartridge and armor-piercing SP6 cartridge. It was developed and manufactured in the late 2010s by Kalashnikov Concern, based on the Yevgeny Dragunov MA Compact Rifle.The weapon is intended for use as a close quarters weapon.\n \n
